title: A Positive Approach
brief_description: People who are coming to terms with being HIV positive or who have AIDS have to face a number of issues at a time when they may be feeling disoriented and vulnerable. This video is aimed at both volunteers and professionals such as social and health workers, volunteer support groups, counsellors, nurses, doctors and prison officers who offer help and support. The program is in four sections: The needs of the person with AIDS; self preparation of the carer/ counsellor; counselling skills; support for the carer/counsellor.
